title: Magazine Designers of Philadelphia...
content:
If you're a Philadelphia designer working primarily in the print medium, I have a question for you. Well, if you're a magazine designer anywhere, you might also be able to shed some light into the mystical world.

How does one get into the wonderful world of magazine design in the city of brotherly love? Who should I be focusing my attention on, directing my communications towards?

I was thinking of contacting the art directors, but I suspect that, that might be futile. And should probably aim lower or elsewhere (production department?, General HR?)

I apologize for the unprofessional sound of this post. I'm really just looking for the nitty-gritty and to perhaps do a little networking with some fellow Typophiles.

Information is value to me now.
author: AndrewSipe
